about_the_game:
Hello there, adventurer! We are a small independent team of enthusiasts who love Sci-Fi. Our main goal is to tell an exciting story about the future world, where humanity has reached outside the Solar system, but remained greedy for resources and power.

Game is currently in development so we need your feedback!


Current Demo about mechanics we have already added to the game. You can check out:
  • Four created game levels;
  • Dialogues with various characters;
  • Global map mechanics;
  • Puzzle solving;
  • Some combat and enemies;
  • Original soundtrack.

Beware of spoilers!

Due to the constant game improvement we still have a plenty work on:
  • Proper character controller and animations;
  • Role-playing mechanics;
  • Additional content entities;
  • Proper UI/UX;
  • Full gamepad support;
  • and other stuff to make this game great!

We're open to your feedback and suggestions. Play the Demo, reach out to us through Discord or other Social media and do your share!

name: DRAKE Demo

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or analogue

short_description: Demo version of DRAKE - narrative driven Sci-Fi action RPG currently in development. Try out our first playable version. Dive into the story, test base mechanics and common flow. Help us improve the game, leave your feedback! Welcome to the harsh world of Space Western.
